title: Home
seoTitle: Regenerative Motherhood - The Path to Generative Infant Sleep
seoDescription: Because supporting your baby's sleep can and should feel mutually nourishing.

children.text: The Path to Generative Infant Sleep
Because supporting your baby's sleep can and should feel mutually nourishing.
Welcome to Regenerative Motherhood
I'm Claire, and I'm here to guide you through a transformative approach to infant sleep that honors both your needs and your baby's development.
The 5 Principles
Connection: Building secure attachment through responsive care
Harmony: Finding balance between your needs and your baby's
Individuality: Honoring your unique baby's temperament and needs
Life: Integrating sleep support into your whole family's rhythm
Nourishment: Feeding your family's wellbeing through rest

title: Work With Me
seoDescription: Personalized sleep support packages designed to meet you where you are.

children.text: Work With Me
Choose the support package that best fits your family's needs.
Sleep Guidance Call
A single 90-minute call to address your most pressing sleep concerns and create an actionable plan.
3-Call Sleep Support
Three calls over six weeks for ongoing support as you implement changes.
Comprehensive Sleep Support
Six weeks of intensive support with calls, messaging, and personalized resources.

title: Sleep Guidance Call
seoDescription: Get clarity and confidence with a single 90-minute consultation.

children.text: Sleep Guidance Call
Perfect for families who need expert guidance and a clear plan to move forward with confidence.
What's Included
90-minute video consultation to dive deep into your sleep challenges
Personalized sleep plan tailored to your baby's age and temperament
Follow-up email with call summary and resources

title: 3-Call Sleep Support
seoDescription: Ongoing support through three calls over six weeks.

children.text: 3-Call Sleep Support
Ideal for families who want ongoing support as they implement sleep changes.
Package Includes
Three 60-minute calls spread over 6 weeks
Email support between calls for quick questions
Adjusted strategies based on your progress

title: Comprehensive Sleep Support
seoDescription: Six weeks of intensive, personalized sleep transformation support.

children.text: Comprehensive Sleep Support
Our most complete package for families ready for a full sleep transformation.
Everything You Get
Six weekly 60-minute calls for continuous support
Daily messaging support via Voxer or WhatsApp
Comprehensive sleep plan with week-by-week adjustments
Resource library with guides, schedules, and troubleshooting tips
The Path to Generative Infant Sleep
Because supporting your baby's sleep can and should feel mutually nourishing.
Welcome to Regenerative Motherhood, where we believe that supporting your baby's sleep should be a nurturing experience for both you and your child.
Our approach to infant sleep is rooted in understanding, compassion, and evidence-based practices that honor both your needs and your baby's development.
